text: Egha me kamaghɨn Aramɨn akamɨn atrivimɨn akam ikaragha ghaze, “Atrivim,2:4 Akar kagh ikegha ghua Daniel 7:28ɨn tuziba, me Hibrun akamɨn dar osirizir puvatɨ. Me Aramɨn akamɨn an osiri. nɨ bar deraghvɨra ikɨ mamaghɨra ikɨ. E ghaze, nɨ faragh uan irebamɨn e mɨkemeghtɨ, e an mɨngarimɨn gun nɨ mɨkɨmam.”
